about_the_game:
Introduction

Distant is a first-person survival horror game in which you go down the rabbit hole of an unsolved investigation regarding a pattern of murders.

You are Arthur Cooper, a former detective who worked on a complex case of possibly related homicides. After his family perished in a tragic car accident, he fell victim to a drinking problem. Deprived of all hope, one day he receives a mysterious object.

It contains coordinates of a distant place that may hold the answers to your previous investigation. Focused and desperate of bringing this case to it's end by yourself, you make your way to the marked destination.

You will be surrounded by miles of stretching forests, no one will come for help.

Will You Find the Real Truth?

Experience the Tense story

Discover what the truth hides by exploring the darkest corners of the village in the middle of Oregon's forests. The things you will find, the secrets you will unravel, must see the light of day, at all cost.

The truth lies deeper than it seems

The government-funded organization NAQ conducted archeological research in the forest. One day, they ceased all work in the area, and their traces disappeared. It's only up to you to uncover this nightmare.

Features

  • Gather resources to ease your way out of intense situations.
  • Look for healing items or craft them in order treat your wounds.
  • Solve intricate puzzles scattered around the game to progress or to collect useful items.
  • Trick the enemies: The enemies will overpower and outnumber you; use the environment and dodge their attacks. You will not be able to fight back.
  • Look for old VHS cassette players in order to find out what started this chain of horror. History cannot repeat itself.
  • Immerse yourself into a story full of mystery and dread combined with realistic graphics and unnerving soundtrack.
  • Outrun the impending death.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content. The Game may also trigger seizures in certain viewers due to exposure to flashing lights or other flashing light patterns.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 / Intel Core i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 570 4GB / NVIDIA GTX 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game might work on lower specs
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i5 10400F
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 5700XT / NVIDIA RTX 2060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p 60FPS

short_description: A mysterious object brings a former detective to a distant place in the middle of nowhere, where the worst nightmares clash with reality. Are you prepared to face your fears in what might be your last investigation?

English*, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil
